static_fields.name: Discover Uruga 42mm Steel | Minase Watches | Made in Japan
static_fields.description: Uruga 42mm steel is powered with a high quality Swiss movement, every steel parts is hand-polished with the Sallaz (sarazu) technique.

hasVariant.name: Uruga 42mm Steel - Ice Blue
hasVariant.description: Uruga 42mm Steel's design was inspired by gems setting. The whole is more round, more classic than the other Minase timepieces and the collection's name clearly represents this novel approach. “Uruga” is an acronym of the Japanese words "Uruwashii" and "Myabi" (pronounced "ga") meaning respectively beauty and elegance.

offers.description: Uruga 42mm Steel's design was inspired by gems setting. The whole is more round, more classic than the other Minase timepieces and the collection's name clearly represents this novel approach. “Uruga” is an acronym of the Japanese words "Uruwashii" and "Myabi" (pronounced "ga") meaning respectively beauty and elegance.
